Quote: There is something wonderful about a book. We can pick it up. We can heft it. We can read it. We can set it down. We can think of what we have read. It does something for us. We can share great minds, great actions, and great undertakings in the pages of a book.
Author: Gordon B. Hinckley,  Standing for Something: Ten Neglected Virtues That Will Heal Our Hearts and Homes
